RR_verdict: The Ultraboost 5 combines classic features with modern advancements such as Light Boost cushioning and a redesigned Primeknit upper. We were also impressed by the durable-yet-grippy Continental outsole and the spacious, comfortable fit. Despite its $180 price tag and substantial weight, we think Adidas has crafted a versatile shoe that does a really great job in everyday wear and daily runs alike.
